snippet: The shooting in Faisalabad was the latest attack on a health care worker amid the government’s struggle to contain the disease.
abstract: Unidentified gunmen kill polio vaccinator in central Pakistan, latest attack on workers who are part of government effort to control the disease.

byline.contributor: Waqar Gillani contributed reporting from Lahore, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The shooting in Faisalabad was the latest attack on a health care worker amid the government’s struggle to contain the disease.
